S

Screen - Class in gui
Represents the superclass of all screens.
Screen(DrawingSurface) - Constructor for class gui.Screen
Creates a general screen.
screens - package screens
 
ScreenSwitcher - Interface in gui
Represents the mechanism for switching screens.
setTargetLocation(float, float) - Method in class game.Camera
Sets location that camera moves towards.
settings() - Method in class gui.DrawingSurface
Sets the size of the drawing surface.
setup() - Method in class gui.DrawingSurface
Sets up the drawing surface.
setVelocity(float, float) - Method in class game.MovableRectangle
Assigns this rectangle the given velocity.
slide() - Method in class game.Camera
Moves this camera smoothly to target location.
START_SCREEN - Static variable in interface gui.ScreenSwitcher
Screen constants.
StartScreen - Class in screens
Represents the game's start screen.
StartScreen(DrawingSurface) - Constructor for class screens.StartScreen
Creates a screen with the game's title and a play button.
Stick - Class in items
Represents a collectible stick item with a rectangular hitbox.
Stick(float, float) - Constructor for class items.Stick
Creates a stick item.
Straw - Class in items
Represents a collectible straw item with a rectangular hitbox.
Straw(float, float) - Constructor for class items.Straw
Creates a straw item.
switchScreen(int) - Method in class gui.DrawingSurface
Switches the screen that this drawing surface displays.
switchScreen(int) - Method in interface gui.ScreenSwitcher
Changes active screen to given screen.
